name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an AWS Cloud Architect with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **AWS** technologies, including **AWS Lambda**, **ECS**, **EC2**, **S3**, **RDS**, **Step Functions**, **IAM**, **Codebuild**, and **Elasticache**, to design and implement scalable cloud solutions. My proficiency in **Infrastructure-as-Code** with **AWS CDK** ensures efficient deployment and management of infrastructure, while my expertise in **SDLC** and automation enhances the development process. 
Additionally, I’m skilled in programming with **Python** and **TypeScript**, utilizing frameworks such as **Angular**, and familiar with tools like **Docker** for containerization. I have hands-on experience with NoSQL and SQL databases, including **Redis** and **MySQL**, and I proficiently track and manage projects using **Jira**. 
With a solid background in full-stack development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**, and a focus on cloud-native architectures, I’ve successfully led the development of high-performance applications aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, ensuring secure and reliable solutions. My experience also includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows, utilizing tools like **MLflow** and **Airflow** for operational efficiency.
